NF.Q: In the column Channels of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 6525? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Third-Party Marketplace} has an outflow of {6545}, {Physical Store} has an outflow of {12942}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Channels and column Product Categories is the flow between 4959 and 6085? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 2091 and 2200? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Students to node Oceania and from node Adults to node South America, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Students} to node {Oceania} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Students to node Oceania and from node Referral Program to node Teens, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Referral Program} to node {Teens} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Physical Store to node Home Appliances, from node Students to node Europe, and from node Africa to node Third-Party Marketplace, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Physical Store} to node {Home Appliances} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Middle East to node Third-Party Marketplace, from node Adults to node Africa, and from node Email Newsletter to node Students, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Middle East} to node {Third-Party Marketplace} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Regions of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Regions is {Africa}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Holiday Promo to target node Electronics? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Holiday Promo to node Electronics is: {Holiday Promo, Seniors, Africa, Third-Party Marketplace, Electronics}.
